mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
replace into t_fullpull_history (id, type, dsName, schemaName, tableName, version, batch_id, state, error_msg, init_time, start_split_time, start_pull_time, end_time, update_time, finished_partition_count, total_partition_count, finished_row_count, total_row_count, project_name, topology_table_id, target_sink_id, target_sink_topic, full_pull_req_msg_offset, first_shard_msg_offset, last_shard_msg_offset, split_column, fullpull_condition ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startSplitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startPullTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishedPartitionCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalPartitionCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{finishedRowCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalRowCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topologyTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetSinkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetSinkTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullPullReqMsgOffset,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{firstShardMsgOffset,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastShardMsgOffset,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{splitColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullpullCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select id, type, dsName, schemaName, tableName, version, batch_id, state, error_msg, init_time, start_split_time, start_pull_time, end_time, update_time, finished_partition_count, total_partition_count, finished_row_count, total_row_count, project_name, topology_table_id, target_sink_id, target_sink_topic, full_pull_req_msg_offset, first_shard_msg_offset, last_shard_msg_offset, split_column, fullpull_condition from t_fullpull_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, type, dsName, schemaName, tableName, version, batch_id, state, error_msg, init_time, start_split_time, start_pull_time, end_time, update_time, finished_partition_count, total_partition_count, finished_row_count, total_row_count, project_name, topology_table_id, target_sink_id, target_sink_topic, full_pull_req_msg_offset, first_shard_msg_offset, last_shard_msg_offset, split_column, fullpull_condition from t_fullpull_history
SELECT h.id FROM t_fullpull_history h,t_project_topo_table tt,t_project_user u WHERE h.topology_table_id = tt.id AND tt.project_id = u.project_id AND u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT DISTINCT ds.id dsId, fh.dsName dsName FROM t_fullpull_history fh, t_dbus_datasource ds
fh.dsName = ds.ds_name
AND ds.id in(select ds_id from t_data_tables dt, t_project_resource pr, t_project_user pu where dt.id = pr.table_id AND pr.project_id = pu.project_id and pu.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
AND fh.project_name = (select project_name from t_project where id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT DISTINCT project_name projectName FROM t_fullpull_history where project_name is not null
AND project_name in (select project_name from t_project p, t_project_user pu where p.id = pu.project_id and pu.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
AND project_name = (select project_name from t_project where id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
